trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow cultist has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow cultist to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow cultist has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The drow cultist's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 10}). The drow cultist can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
